thread.title: Aisha Buhari condoles Pauline Tallen, Buba Galadima
thread.title_full: Aisha Buhari condoles Pauline Tallen, Buba Galadima

author: Augustine Ehikioya, Abuja
title: Aisha Buhari condoles Pauline Tallen, Buba Galadima
text:
Home Featured Aisha Buhari condoles Pauline Tallen, Buba Galadima Aisha Buhari condoles Pauline Tallen, Buba Galadima Posted By: Augustine Ehikioya, Abuja on: March 28, 2017 Tweet 0 Mrs Aisha Buhari The Wife of the President, Mrs. Aisha Buhari has expressed condolences to Mrs. Pauline Tallen, former Deputy Governor of Plateau state, over the death of her husband, Elder John Katkwap Tallen, who died at 83. 
In a statement by the Director of Information, Office of the Wife of the President, Suleiman Haruna, she described him as an elder statesman, whose contributions to national development would not be forgotten. She was speaking during a condolence visit to the home of the late statesman, in Abuja, on Tuesday . She prayed God to repose his soul and give the family the fortitude to bear the irreparable loss. Mrs. Buhari was received by the widow, Mrs. Pauline Tallen, and other close family members and friends.
